text: Hyde Park on Hudson is a 2012 British-American biographical comedy-drama movie. It was directed by Roger Mitchell. It is set in New York in 1939. It stars Bill Murray as Franklin D. Roosevelt and Laura Linney as Roosevelt's mistress Margaret Suckley. It was released to mixed reviews on 1 February 2013. == Other websites == * Category:2010s biographical movies Category:2012 comedy-drama movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British comedy-drama movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in the 1930s Category:Movies directed by Roger Michell
title: Hyde Park on Hudson
